mapper.select: select qt.*, case qt.class_id when 1 then LEAST((select count(1) from quiz.q_answers qa where qa.responder_user_id = #{userId} and qa.created_at >= #{earliestDateTime}), qt.condition_number) when 2 then LEAST((select count(1) from quiz.q_answers qa left join quiz.q_paper qp on qp.paper_id = qa.paper_id where qp.creator_user_id = #{userId} and qa.created_at >= #{earliestDateTime}), qt.condition_number) end as finish_number, qtr.is_receive_award, qp.prop_name as award_name, qc.sub_class_name as class_name, qc.sub_class_describe as class_describe from quiz.q_task qt left join quiz.q_task_record qtr on qt.task_id = qtr.task_id left join quiz.q_prop qp on qt.award_id = qp.prop_id left join quiz.q_classes qc on qc.sub_class_id = qt.class_id and qc.class_id = 2 where qtr.user_id = #{userId} and qtr.created_at >= #{earliestDateTime};

select qt.*, qtr.finish_number, qtr.is_receive_award, qp.prop_name as award_name, qc.sub_class_name as class_name, qc.sub_class_describe as class_describe from quiz.q_task qt left join quiz.q_task_record qtr on qt.task_id = qtr.task_id left join quiz.q_prop qp on qt.award_id = qp.prop_id left join quiz.q_classes qc on qc.sub_class_id = qt.class_id and qc.class_id = 2 where qtr.user_id = #{userId} and qt.task_id = #{taskId} and qtr.created_at >= #{earliestDateTime}
